document_type.reason: Large header text at top-right reads 'INVOICE' — matches schema's document_type enum and prominent header cue.

invoice_number.reason: Right-column label 'INVOICE NO:' followed by '01234' — visual proximity to label and typical invoice-number placement.

invoice_date.reason: Right-column label 'DATE:' followed by '11.02.2030'. Normalized to ISO-8601 assuming the printed format is DD.MM.YYYY as typical in this layout.

due_date.reason: Right-column label 'DUE DATE:' followed by '11.03.2030'. Normalized to ISO-8601 (assumed DD.MM.YYYY pattern consistent with invoice_date).

terms.reason: No explicit 'Terms' or 'Net' string found near invoice metadata in the visible document.

currency.reason: Monetary values in totals and line items are prefixed with '$' (e.g., '$100', '$440'); normalized to USD.

vendor.reason: No distinct issuer/company block (vendor header) was detected. The visible left block is labelled 'ISSUED TO' (customer), while no top-left company name or address for the seller is present in the image.

customer.reason: Block labelled 'ISSUED TO:' contains name 'Richard Sanchez', organization 'Thynk Unlimited', and '123 Anywhere St., Any City'. Street and city parsed from the single address line; other subtler parts (state/postal/country/contact) not present.

normalized_value.details_text:
Borcele Bank
Account Name: Adeline Palmerston
Account No.: 0123 4567 8901

pay_to.reason: Block labelled 'PAY TO:' contains bank and account details. 'Borcele Bank' appears as the bank/payee, 'Account Name: Adeline Palmerston' and 'Account No.: 0123 4567 8901' are captured. Account number normalized by removing spaces.

line_items.reason: Tabular items area with header row 'DESCRIPTION | UNIT PRICE | QTY | TOTAL'. Each row lists a description, unit price '100', quantity '1', and a printed total '$100'. Values extracted by column alignment under headers.

item_table_headers.reason: Top of the items table clearly shows header labels 'DESCRIPTION', 'UNIT PRICE', 'QTY', 'TOTAL' across the columns — used to map item columns.

subtotal.reason: The totals area explicitly shows 'SUBTOTAL' with '$400' printed beneath the items table; taken as displayed value and normalized to number by removing currency symbol.

discount.reason: No 'Discount' line or percent/amount visible in the totals area of this document.

tax_rate.reason: Totals area displays 'Tax 10%'. Captured as displayed percent string and normalized to decimal 0.10.

tax_amount.reason: Document shows tax rate '10%' but no explicit tax monetary line. Tax amount computed as 10% of the displayed SUBTOTAL $400 (0.10 * 400 = 40); reported with reason describing computation from visible subtotal and tax rate.

total.reason: Totals section explicitly shows 'TOTAL' with '$440'; normalized by stripping currency symbol to numeric 440.

payment_instructions.normalized_value:

payment_instructions.reason: The 'PAY TO:' block contains freeform payment instructions including bank name, account name and account number. Preserved as a text blob for payment_instructions.

due_terms_note.reason: No short terms/late fee note or explicit payment terms shown near totals beyond the Due Date; nothing labeled 'Terms' or similar was visible.

logo_present.reason: No distinct corporate logo graphic detected in the header; only the textual large 'INVOICE' header and a decorative line are present.

raw_text_blocks.reason: OCR-like extraction of prominent text blocks and lines from the document preserved for downstream parsing; blocks grouped by visual layout (header, left column, pay-to, right invoice meta, table, totals).

detected_language.reason: All visible text is in English (labels like 'INVOICE', 'ISSUED TO', 'PAY TO', 'TOTAL').
